text: Mohammed Saeed al-Sahhaf ( ; 30 July 1940 â€“ ) also known as Baghdad Bob or Comical Ali, is an Iraqi former diplomat and politician. He became well known during the 2003 invasion of Iraq, during which he was the Media and Foreign Affairs Minister under Iraqi President Saddam Hussein. He was spokesman for the Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party and Saddam's government. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Iraqi politicians
title: Muhammad Saeed al-Sahhaf
